title: Album Page, "Iron Railing, Freudenstadt", September 13, 1887
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on cream paperboard tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, clockwise from bottom center:  same as No. I / I / No. II / (inscribed in circle) 40 / Freudenstadt / Sept 13th / 1887.
description:
Horizontal sheet tipped vertically into binding.  Ornamental railing with faceted, tapered newel post ending in a ball finial.  The railing consists of two levels of scrolling ornament with joints highlighted in golden yellow.  The scrollwork terminates in small flowers, also in golden yellow.  A small, detailed drawing of one of the flowers is positioned to the upper right of the drawing of the railing and is noted as I, which corresponds to a small flower in the railing that is rendered less clearly. 

Related to railing depicted in 1943-51-119.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Iron Railing, Freudenstadt", September 13, 1887.
September 13, 1887. Brush and watercolor, graphite on cream paperboard tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-120.
